author: Dean Wright
comment: Love the wallpapers and use it on both my phone and tablet. The daily auto change of wallpaper doesn't work on either my Moto G4 or Samsung galaxy tab s2. Nor did it on my previous tab and phone. It's my only problem with the app so I figured 4* until it does as it states. Thanks anyway.

author: ARPIT BAJPAI
comment: The app always stops working on my moto 360 2nd gen. It happen every time when ever i try to set it as my watch's face. I am using the latest version of Android on my watch.
title: Always stops working

author: Sudatt Shakyamuni
comment: They are nice but the wallpapers do not fit in the centre of my display even if I use single screen on my display and kept the the scroll wallpaper option off. Maybe they just don't want to fit in the centre of my screen.😅

reply.author: Red Bull
reply.content:
Hi Sudatt, 

we are sorry to hear that you are not happy with the positioning of the wallpapers. We will keep this in mind. However, the position of the wallpaper depends a bit on how many screens you are using, so that when you swipe you have the full image across all screens. 

I hope this explanation helps?

Best, 
Red Bull Wallpapers Support

title: The wallpapers are cool but....

author: Aditi Sharma
comment: This app used to support my moto360 smart watch and after the last update it doesn't support it anymore. Please fix the bug. I really like the wallpapers but I want it in my smart watch again.
title: Not working in moto360

author: arun prasadh
comment: I think it has support for only round watch faces..please resolve this issue
title: Keeps crashing on my zenwatch 2

author: Mohammad Imdad Sadi
comment: The watch face keeps crashing on wearables. Every time i pair the watch, i see crash notifications. I couldnt even use the watch without uninstalling this app!
title: Watch face crash!

author: COWDRIFTER 67
comment: Love this app guys but would love to see some V8 Supercars on there plz considering u guys have three cars in it this year and by what I herd looking at another two for next season so some V8s plz guys
title: Need SVG

author: MIHIRZZ PATEL
comment: A great hd wallpaper are showcased & even same we can download for free are best features I have ever seen. Thanks to this app, because this app's wallpaper has made my phone more attractive.

author: Anupam Potdar
comment: Ever since nougat update only homescreen wallpaper is changed. Lock screen wallpaper remains unchanged. Quote annoying.
title: Nougat update spoilt it

author: Sam Pickford
comment: They screen savers don't change everyday automatically. Small thing that could be fixed. Besides that it awesome!

author: Rajat Jain
comment: I'm using this app for a while now and still there issue with the auto change in wallpaper, I think you guys should work on it
title: Auto upadate

author: Haziq Saipolamin
comment: Red Bull does have a lists of football club in their brand. FC Red Bull Salzburg, RB Leipzig, New York Red Bulls, Red Bull Brazil, Red Bull Ghana and etc. Your photographers sure can do some magic taking photographs in the football pitch aite?
title: Need Football Wallpapers too!

author: abhinaya agarwal
comment: The wallpaper disappears as soon as you close the app rendering this unusable for me. I am rating a single star until this is fixed. Edit: this was a problem with just one wallpaper for some reason. It has now fixed itself.
title: Wallpaper disappears on closing app

author: Scott Duran
comment: This app. is far out man. I really dig it. Can't wait to check out the new pics. whenever they come out. Easily 5 stars.
title: SPD G7

author: Amruth Kumar
comment: Since the time I enabled daydream option through this app, i am unable to disable it ever in Redmi 3s Prime. Even after uninstalling this app.

author: Vaibhav Chavan
comment: Yes I loved it, but the only one thing is missing in live wallpapers. there r few live wallpapers on the charts u should first preference to live wallpapers

author: Brandon Farrokhian
comment: Nothin like watching someone throwing them selfs down a sick mountain gets me pumped!
title: Inspirational

author: Abhratanu Chowdhury
comment: Man it's awsm .. its freakin awesome ... Dnt knw wat others say about it but fr me it's the bestest wallpaper app.....loved ittt nah nah addicted to the wallpapers

author: ChrisisHereO2
comment: Very amazing wallpapers. Just the frames per second of the live wallpapers are a bit low. They lag a bit.

author: Jayme Salo
comment: love the daily rotating wallpaper feature! just wish there were more moto wallpapers.

author: Mikael Proper
comment: Fantastic, only issue is often when selecting a new wallpaper it won't set right away. I have to go back and change it a couple times before it actually sets

author: HARISH ANANDARAO
comment: The wallpaper doesn't change everyday besides it is awesome
I love the app It would be a 5 star rating if I could download them, or there should be a second option to make it your lock screen wallpaper

author: Akshim Vasistha
comment: Great collection of sporty wallpapers.. But for me auto wallpaper change is an issue.. I have to go to settings everyday to change it ..  Otherwise awesome

author: Faisal Rahmat
comment: When I turn my phone on  the next day the wallpaper  changed.

author: serkan sarcan
comment: Noone matches with Redbull wallpapers. There is no better one.
title: Perfect

author: Sai Muralidhar Maheedhara
comment: The live wallpaper are good. If I can fix the position of the image and get the liveness, it would be Ausome..Must download and try!!

author: Biju Baro
comment: Very nice stunning wallpapers for android ever...
title: Good..

author: Stepan Pravdin
comment: Крутое приложение, я перестал заморачиваться с подбором обоев, и каждый день меня радуют крутые снимки!

author: Ruthvik Bhargav R
comment: Ask where to set wallpaper to home screen or lock screen! We want different wallpaper everywhere. In next update please take this note.

author: jaydev kalivarapu
comment: Does not work most times

author: Firewalker 25c
comment: Such a great app!! Every picture has fantastic quality and my favorite will probably be the snowboarding cause that's my sport !🤘
Nice selection, however the auto change doesn't work and kept crashing the app.

author: Lawrence J
comment: Great for most devices as I know it so far as well as my own device. Simple and free :)
title: Great!

author: Swaroop BT
comment: Catchy wallpapers... Refreshing...But, won't get automatically changed everyday.
title: Refreshing Wallpapers

comment: Cause it has everything from red bull and has every type of racing

author: Eamon McDonough
comment: Pictures are amazing, but needs updated way more often. Come on Red Bull...

author: Adrian A
comment: Super colour, great scenes, puts you in a dreamworld for just a sec and motivates you to get back into it,,, great.?...

author: Ashish Sunkari
comment: amazin pics, but no latest F1 2017 pics of Max and Dan😭

author: Divyansh Condal
comment: The quality of wallpapers is really good and the interface of the app is also refreshing.
title: Just Amazing
